00016 class DefaultSearchStringParser : public IGiven
00017 {
00018 public:
00019     void setup(const World&)
00020     {
00021         m_search_string_parser = boost::shared_ptr<SearchStringParser>(new SearchStringParser());
00022     }

00025     {
00026         return m_search_string_parser;

00033 class SearchStringIs : public IWhen
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     SearchStringIs() {}
00037 
00038     SearchStringIs(std::string search_string) : m_search_string(search_string) {}
00039 
00040     void occurs(const World& world)
00041     {
00042         m_search_terms = world.GetGiven<DefaultSearchStringParser>()->get_search_string_parser()->parse(m_search_string);
00043     }
00044 
00045     const std::vector<std::string>& get_search_terms() const
00046     {
00047         return m_search_terms;
00048     }
00049 
00050 private:
00051     std::string m_search_string;
00052     std::vector<std::string> m_search_terms;
00053 };
00054 
00055 class ValidSearchTermsAreReturned : public IThen
00056 {
00057 public:
00058     ValidSearchTermsAreReturned() {}
00059 
00060     ValidSearchTermsAreReturned(std::vector<std::string> expected_search_terms) : m_expected_search_terms(expected_search_terms) {}
00061 
00062     void ensure_that(const World& world)
00063     {
00064         std::vector<std::string> actual_search_terms = world.GetWhen<SearchStringIs>()->get_search_terms();
00065 
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(m_expected_search_terms.size(), actual_search_terms.size());
00067 
00068         std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator expected_term = m_expected_search_terms.begin();
00069         std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator actual_term = actual_search_terms.begin();
00070 
00071         for (; expected_term != m_expected_search_terms.end(); ++expected_term, ++actual_term)
00072         {
00073             CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(*expected_term, *actual_term);
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077 private:
00078     std::vector<std::string> m_expected_search_terms;
00079 };

00081 class SearchStringParserBehavior : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00082 {
00083     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(SearchStringParserBehavior);
00084     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldTreatSpacesInSearchStringAsAndOperators);
00085     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldTreatQuotedStringsInSearchStringAsOneTerm);
00086     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldParseStringWithQuotedAndUnquotedStrings);
00087     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldParseStringWithConsecutiveQuotedStrings);
00088     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldRemoveLeadingAndTrailingWhitespace);
00089     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00090 
00091 public:
00092     void shouldTreatSpacesInSearchStringAsAndOperators()
00093     {
00094         World world;
00095 
00096         std::vector<std::string> expected_search_terms;
00097         expected_search_terms.push_back("Foo");
00098         expected_search_terms.push_back("bar");
00099         expected_search_terms.push_back("yes");
00100         expected_search_terms.push_back("no");
00101 
00102         world.Given<DefaultSearchStringParser>();
00103         world.When<SearchStringIs>("Foo bar yes no");
00104         world.Then<ValidSearchTermsAreReturned>(expected_search_terms);
00105     }
00106 
00107     void shouldTreatQuotedStringsInSearchStringAsOneTerm()
00108     {
00109         World world;
00110 
00111         std::vector<std::string> expected_search_terms;
00112         expected_search_terms.push_back("Foo bar");
00113 
00114         world.Given<DefaultSearchStringParser>();
00115         world.When<SearchStringIs>("\"Foo bar\"");
00116         world.Then<ValidSearchTermsAreReturned>(expected_search_terms);
00117     }
00118 
00119     void shouldParseStringWithQuotedAndUnquotedStrings()
00120     {
00121         World world;
00122 
00123         std::vector<std::string> expected_search_terms;
00124         expected_search_terms.push_back("test");
00125         expected_search_terms.push_back("Foo bar");
00126         expected_search_terms.push_back("yes");
00127 
00128         world.Given<DefaultSearchStringParser>();
00129         world.When<SearchStringIs>("test \"Foo bar\" yes");
00130         world.Then<ValidSearchTermsAreReturned>(expected_search_terms);
00131     }
00132 
00133     void shouldParseStringWithConsecutiveQuotedStrings()
00134     {
00135         World world;
00136 
00137         std::vector<std::string> expected_search_terms;
00138         expected_search_terms.push_back("Foo bar");
00139         expected_search_terms.push_back("yes no");
00140 
00141         world.Given<DefaultSearchStringParser>();
00142         world.When<SearchStringIs>("\"Foo bar\"\"yes no\"");
00143         world.Then<ValidSearchTermsAreReturned>(expected_search_terms);
00144     }
00145 
00146     void shouldRemoveLeadingAndTrailingWhitespace()
00147     {
00148         World world;
00149 
00150         std::vector<std::string> expected_search_terms;
00151         expected_search_terms.push_back("Foo bar");
00152 
00153         world.Given<DefaultSearchStringParser>();
00154         world.When<SearchStringIs>("   \"Foo bar\"     ");
00155         world.Then<ValidSearchTermsAreReturned>(expected_search_terms);
00156     }
